website_summaries.verdict: If you need a dome for smaller children, this is a good bet and has the bonus of a huge weight capacity so everyone can pile on.
pros: Good if you do not have very much space
Has a 7 foot diameter and is 4 feet high
Not a very big dome climber, which makes it a good choice for smaller children
Fun for play and not so high you have to worry about falls
cons: Dome takes a little bit of time and patience to assemble

website_summaries.verdict: If climbing and hanging tops your child’s list of favorite jungle gym activities, this playground classic fits the bill.
pros: kids can improve balance, agility, and strength while playing
Simple design encourages unrestricted creative play
Robust build is UV- and rust-resistant
Size works well for smaller yards
cons: Some children may miss extra features, but for many, its beauty lies in the structure's simplicity

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this. It is easily moved to mow the ...
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this. It is easily moved to mow the lawn under it. It is very sturdy. Comes in hundreds of pieces, be prepared for a long day of building and you need 2 people to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: S. Soliz

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. It took me 4 hrs to make it all alone. Women power!
customer_reviews.author: hetal patel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos love it ! We put it inside ! We don’t use the dining room area so that where we put it (;
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product... at start. After a few months 75% of the nuts were rusted ! Too bad, overall a lot of fun, but this detail makes it ugly and diificult to disassemble and move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts! Problem rectified
customer_reviews.text: I planned a babysitter to build this thing as a surprise and I’m missing parts. Calling the toll free line when it opens up on Monday to try and fix the issue, but that’s two days from now so my plan is ruined. Will update review once I’ve talked to customer service. :( so happy this was a surprise and I don’t have to deal with unhappy kids. Update: we were told 6-8 weeks to get the parts... Update: the company seriously underpromised and overdelivered on the parts. Instead of 6-8 weeks we got them in 3 days. We put it together over the weekend. Easy build with good instructions and solid once put up. My kids are loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: RUST!!!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't even had this for a year and it is starting to rust already. SO DISAPPOINTED! Also, it took two days to assemble and was not easy as the product description would have you believe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have four boys ages five and under and the older three boys enjoy this dome! My 5 year old loves to hang upside down it! It was fairly easy to put together with 2 people. Don't bang the bars together by the end pieces because it can scratch the coating off. I am adding a picture of my son and my husband, who is 6 ft, sitting on the dome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t the easiest to put together, and I’m glad I had my daughter to help, but once we finished tightening all the 10,000 bolts (exaggeration but it definitely feels that way) it was nice and tight. I can’t comment on the durability because it’s only been two days outside. But my grandson loves it. We have hardly been able to get him off of it. For the money, it was most definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Jaster

customer_reviews.title: Good value, relatively easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to another reviewer's suggestion, I used an electric drill to tighten the bolts. This structure was relatively easy to put together by one adult even with help from a pair of preschoolers. Parts are well marked and structure came together within a few hours. Paint doesn't seem super durable, but the overall structure seems strong and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Great climbing dome!
customer_reviews.text: This dome is pretty awesome. It is sturdy and relatively lightweight - light enough that it can be moved to mow under. It took two adults many hours to get it complete (it was the project of the day and we took breaks during assembly) and wasn’t that hard, but was rather monotonous. The kids (9 & 11)were able to help a bit so it was a good family project. It’s been up for about two months and looks good - no rust yet, but I’d expect it to get some by the end of the summer, spiders love it. Overall we’re really pleased!
customer_reviews.author: tracybgee

customer_reviews.title: Daycare kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an addition to my backyard for my home daycare. The kids think it’s great and it’s just the right size for the one year olds to feel adventurous and crawl through bottom all the way up to the school age that crawl to the top and hang out and talk and do tricks. It took my husband and I about an hour and half to set up. Very sturdy and easy to grab and move when we need to mow the lawn. And I like that it’s versatile vs other climbers in that we can throw a parachute or tarp over and make it a fort and play games under it. It was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jmk76

customer_reviews.title: Not a "5"
customer_reviews.text: Notice the angles that all the bars are on - there is nearly nothing rectangular anywhere, making stepping, climbing, sitting, and getting proper footing frustrating for 3-5 year olds. Not sure why other reviews are so positive - we've got a preschool and for kids ages 3-5 this immediately went from excitement to disinterest. Assembly takes at least 3 hours for a skilled handyman at a reasonable pace.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Assembling this now. Very happy with the purchase. You can do it with just one person though it may be easier with help. Instructions are good. Follow them and you will do just fine. The tedious part is tightening all the bolts but that's the nature of this type of item. Bars don't get too hot in the sun but the bolts and nuts do. Product comes with covers for nuts, so that mitigates the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: You cannot really take it appart
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and works well but your really cannot take it appart once you have put it together because of the kind of screws used to put it together. Otherwise a great, well made piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Lindaartist

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: It took 3 hours for two men to assemble. It arrived a day before Easter. My grandkids get hours of play in our backyard. No worries that they can't go to the park due to covid-19.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little one loving it!
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo is loving this dome, it took us a few hours to assemble but follow instructions was easy. You need 2 people to assemble to make it easy and my daughter was great help. just make sure you assemble put the union plates on the out side, we didn't pay attention to that and I had to re-do half the dome but that was on me.
customer_reviews.author: Pao

customer_reviews.title: Study, well made climber
customer_reviews.text: Our climber is 6 years old and was still going strong. Numerous kids and adults have climbed on it, jumped off it, and made forts out if. Unfortunately, it took some damage during Hurricane Michael as our shed and fence smashed off it, but the darn thing is still standing.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, very sturdy and great price. A must have!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have absolutely loved this toy! It took a bit of work to put it together naturally,but all the pieces were there and it was clearly outlined how to do it. It's very sturdy and well made which I was concerned about because it's such a great price . It's extremely durable. It has transformed our back yard into a private playground along with one other toy we purchased. I highly recommend buying this you if you have small kiddos who like to climb and explore.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 people to assemble. Easy instructions. I just thought it would be a bit taller. But I guess for the kids it’s an okay fit. It’s probably as tall as a 10 year old. But again, the kids like it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping little ones busy and active
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my younger grandchildren ages seven and four. They are enjoying it. Not only do they climb it, but they also find other creative ways to play with it. Sometimes it’s a fort or a playhouse. It helps them stay active and build muscles while having fun.
customer_reviews.author: TCinID

customer_reviews.title: Great for climbers
customer_reviews.text: Great climber for all. Took a bit to assemble. But we love it. Has showed Some signs of rust though.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Great addition to our playground. Our kids love this! It is durable and fun and holds up in the weather. We live in the hot desert and it has held up for over two years now with no fading. My 7 year old can hang upside down from the top without hitting the ground. My husband (200lbs) climbs on there with the kids and it is fine. They have made it into a fort with a sheet. This is a great gift idea. We move it all the time to mow the lawn. We did not spike it down, it is heavy enough to hold itself down. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my granddaughter! When I called in need of missing parts the response was quick. The parts came in just 2 days. This will last for years. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great dome climber if it had all its parts and the right tools included
customer_reviews.text: Great product for kids 4-10. Bought one years ago for our kids. Bought this one for our 4year old grandson.upgraded safety feature with durable plastic bolt covers. He loves it and plays on it constantly - as soon as we rounded up all the missing parts. On top of that the Allen wrench provided is to small for the 265 provided Allen- headed bolts. This is the only tool needed for assembly but if you don't have a metric set of your own, you kids aren't climbing anywhere. Had order and return a second set and cannibalize it for parts. Oh by the way the package weights 110 lbs. not a fun lift for the second time
customer_reviews.author: g dickson gribble

customer_reviews.title: Great Monkey Bars for young kids!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Grandkids, ages 3, 6 and 10. They absolutely love it and so do I. Very well made and sturdy. Hopefully it will last a long time. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor climber
customer_reviews.text: I was a little overwhelmed when I pulled all the pieces out of the box... But was able to do it. You definitely want to do it with a second person to help. We built in in a couple hours. It is incredibly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: ... set up in the yard and it is very sturdy, secure and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We just got this set up in the yard and it is very sturdy, secure and lots of fun! Both my 9 year old and 4 year old enjoyed climbing on it, hanging on it...It was missing 1 washer, however it is an easy to buy and cheap part so I didn't wait to contact the company for replacement. I assembled all the parts by myself in less than an hour, then it took two of us probably 1 1/2 hours to assemble the different sections and secure all the nuts. This is definitely a 2 person job, but not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Tedious to assemble, but loads of fun.
customer_reviews.text: I had to put this together myself and it took forever. Not difficult, but very, very tedious. It would have been much more pleasant if I'd had my husband to help but I wanted it put together ASAP so I didn't wait for him. My kids (24 months and almost 4 years) are IN LOVE with this thing. They are climbers, they climb EVERYTHING and this was absolutely perfect for them. So now instead of getting on to them all day for climbing the furniture, I send them outside. We have a tiny back yard and small kids so the size is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this and so does my 4 year old and twin 2 year olds. It is awesome and great quality. It's a stretch for the the twin but they like the challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Truthful

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pieces but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing obviously comes in roughly 73.5 billion pieces but my husband put it together by himself, over a few days, in probably 2-3 hours total. Seems pretty sturdy. Not too big for my 3.5yo, not too small for my 7yo.
customer_reviews.author: Makeup Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great even for under age 2
customer_reviews.text: Grandbabies love it! The size is great even for the smallest ones. As they grow in upper body strength and confidence, they climb higher. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S. Brownfield

customer_reviews.title: We love this!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but i thought it was necessary for this one! We bought this for my daughters 5th birthday! We LOVE this dome climber! My daughter loves to have the neighborhood kids and my friends kids over all the time and this thing is their absolute favorite and is big enough for all of them to have fun and not get in eachothers way. Set up took awhile but not impossible. Shipping was right on time. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Lara

customer_reviews.title: No way kids can hurt this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but a couple hundred bolts takes a long time. Contacted manufacturer for a missing part and it was in hand in 2 days. Fast service. Very stout product.
customer_reviews.author: T Hult

customer_reviews.title: This is adorable! I set it up myself in 3-4 hours
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! I set it up myself in 3-4 hours..(yes 2 people would have been better)! DEFINITELY recommend a ratchet, and I went a bought one before I started. #120 bolts that needed tightened, and readjusted. For an overall piece of playground equipment, this is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth j.

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable, fun, great value.
customer_reviews.text: This investment was well worth the money. My grandchildren absolutely love it. They will play on it for hours. "It's just like the one at school".. they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny

customer_reviews.title: Play structure become a tent. Enhances creativity.
customer_reviews.text: We love this item. The kids love it. Not only can you climb on it, it can be made into a tent. The kids covered it with blankets and actually slept in it one night. It was set up in the garage at first. Daddy spent the night with the kids on their great adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Delano

customer_reviews.title: Took a little longer than I thought to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a little longer than I thought to put together was bigger than expected after getting it together I tested it's strength by climbing on top of it and jumped up and down it didn't give bow or flex and I'm a big man well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: SDC

customer_reviews.title: Such a good climbing frame
customer_reviews.text: Such a good climbing frame! It’s super-strong, pretty straightforward to set up (be aware, lots of bolts!) and has been used every day since we bought it. Makes a great cubby house 😀 my rating would be five stars ⭐️ but the only drawback (and thus is personal preference) is the primary colour scheme. Would love to see a two-tone green.
customer_reviews.author: jess cox

customer_reviews.title: Worst Possible Scenario
customer_reviews.text: We kept this hidden from our 2 and 4 year olds and planned to put it together Christmas Eve. The morning of, we noticed that 2 of the metal plates were in the wrong packaging. Turns out, they gave us too many of one size and not enough of the other. So now my kids' "big gift" will be 3 or more days late and I've got to keep them out of the backyard where the partially put together climber is hanging out. Customer service said it'd take 3 days or so to get the parts to me...no apologies...no nada. I am beyond pissed
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: We Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids to keep them playing in the woods and out of the sun. I work from home and they swarm around me all summer. The yard is too hot during the day and my office is next to their room. They wouldn't go play in the woods no matter what I did, until I bought this. It's a magical kid catcher! It's fun to climb, but they really love sitting inside it. It was so effective that my kids that they have built a huge "fort" around it! Success!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Space Dome Climber for my 3 children and their friends. They love it!! The Space Dome is not complicated to put together but does take a few hours. Have at least 2 people to put it together, more makes it easier. We had 3 people helping and it wasn't too bad but when tightening the bolts we did have to switch off a few times as to not get too wore out. As for the Dome itself, it is very well made, very tough product that will hold plenty of weight. I would recommend this Space Dome to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: WVfadedglory

customer_reviews.title: Great for the toddler
customer_reviews.text: My two year old granddaughter looks like a little monkey on the thing. Both granddaughter and product are sturdy, good match. I was worried about assembly but it was no problem for this old man. My son in law put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Bought this for my two boys age 2 & 4, they both love it. It took my hubby about 2 uninterrupted hours to put it together, nothing too crazy. My kids play on it enough but I have to remind them about it sometimes, you know how they love toys elsewhere but not as much when you bring them home?! I'm going to get a giant blanket to throw over it so they can pretend it's a cave or igloo, they're very excited about that.
customer_reviews.author: macaroniandliam

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like this new addition to our backyard. Kids love climbing. Period. Glad we got this size for our backyard instead of the 10 foot radius one. This one is PLENTY big. The highest center point is just about 4 feet. You will absolutely need 2 people, sometimes 3 to put this together. It took us about 3 or 4 hours. It's very sturdy. My kids--3, 4, and 7 really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson was so excited to have the playground in his own back yard! His smile said it all!
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Easier to assembly than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It went together pretty easily, and is pretty sturdy. Time will tell about the durability
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, strong, weather resistant
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. We have had it for three years. It was not easy to put together and my brother and dad said that I owed them big time. Not really a one man job due to having to match it all up perfectly. But once together it is sturdy, strong. The color has never faded, nor worn off. I have four kids and they play on it all the time. It has gone through 3 winters of snow and rain, and 3 summers of desert heat! My kids are now 6-9 and still love playing on it. Can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: smlwoman

customer_reviews.title: Bigger then it states
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our sons 3rd birthday. Which is next week. It's alot bigger then we had planned on, but the way I see it is we got more for our money & our son will be able to play with it for a very long time. It's built well and seems like its going to last. I wasn't pleased whatsoever with the delivery of it, the box was only taped with little tiny packers tape. Thankfully all of the pieces were there & not damaged. We have it at my parents house in their garage until the big day. I can't wait to see his face! :)
customer_reviews.author: Eckhardt08

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This Space Dome rusted after just 2 years. It cut my granddaughter’s hand so it went to the dump.
customer_reviews.author: B. Iott

customer_reviews.title: Easier with 2 people putting together, great quality, heavy box
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and bright colors of this climber! Size is perfect for our smaller yard but still big enough for the kids to have fun with. Loved seeing all these little kids being entertained especially outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took awhile, but it was not to complicated. I think it is worth every peeny. I would not recomend this for children under 4 yrs of age! My 5yr old loves this but did fall and get a tiny owie. And it is very large and high off the ground in the center. This has a lot of opportunities for creative play! Cover with a blanket make a fort, its the dungon and the princess needs saved. And many other great ideas kids come up with.
customer_reviews.author: DeeLips

customer_reviews.title: the kids love to play on this
customer_reviews.text: I have a child care and the kids love this, it big enough for 6 kids on top. I would bye this again
customer_reviews.author: Penny Dube

customer_reviews.title: the little ones love it as well as the big ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over 3 years ago, and many children have climbed this dome and continue enjoying. the little ones love it as well as the big ones!!! It took several people and hours to put together, but it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: DRW

customer_reviews.title: JUNGLE GYM
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a gift for my grandson. I had it delivered right to their door and my son had to put it together. He told me that it did not take him as long as he thought that it would and that my grandson loves to play on it and so does his friends. Product is of good quality as advised by my son and I know it has to be because his wife would not let my grandson play on it unless it was very safe. Again, grandpa did not have to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY D.  SAMPLE

customer_reviews.title: Appears well made
customer_reviews.text: Easy for this 78 yr old grandma to put together. Had son do final tightening of bolts though. Only wish bars weren’t so far apart. Best for 5 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Eilyne

customer_reviews.title: Durable,Great fun
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this climber for our two grandchildren, ages 3 and 5. They absolutely love it. They use it all the time. It took about an hour or so to put it together with two people doing it. It is very rugged as I have climbed on it with the grandkids. The only complaint that I have is that the box it came in was in pretty tough shape. We were lucky enough that none of the pieces were missing, but that was purely luck. Other than that, it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SmartGrammy

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: while this was pretty simple to assemble, it's better with two people for saving time. This one took one person four hours to put together but it was well worth it. HEAVY, sturdy. my 3 year old and my husband were both on it together at one point and it didn't bend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE DOME
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT FOR XMAS GIFT. 1ST ONE CAME MISSING 6 HOLE BRACKET THOUGH-GLAD I CHECKED IN TIME. AMAZON QUICKLY REPLACED. ASSEMBLED BEFORE 2 HRS/2 PEOPLE. VERY STURDY & GOOD SIZE FOR GRANDCHILDREN WHO ARE 4 Y/O TWINS. NICE PRODUCT AND WOULD RECOMMEND IT. LOOKS MORE DIFFICULT TO PUT TOGETHER THAN IT REALLY IS. JUST ALOT OF ASSEMBLY AT BEGINING AND THEN ALL GOES INTO PLACE EASILY.
customer_reviews.author: JHLV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks better than I imagined. Very happy with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Complete assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Great when it is done but nothing is put together ahead of time. Seemed like hundreds of pieces!
customer_reviews.author: MLP

customer_reviews.title: domed monkey bars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these domed monkey bars for the grandma yard for the grandkids.. They have loved it. Ages 18 months to 15 all climb on it and truly enjoy it. It was a great investment. It was a little cumbersome constructing but once we discovered you had to follow the directions exactly (duh!!) we finally got it up. It is very sturdy and I am sure will entertain the kids for years to come..
customer_reviews.author: grandmadh

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STURDY
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT LOOKING STURDY CLIMBING DOME. I BOUGHT FOR MY 3 1/2 TWIN GRAND CHILDREN AND THEY ARE LOVING IT ALONG WITH THEIR 6-8 YEAR OLD FRIENDS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every kid loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our 4-year old granddaughter, who loves to climb trees. It was perfect for her, and also her sister, not yet three, and cousins, who are much older. It was not hard to assemble, and can easily be moved for lawn maintenance. High quality materials. Caution: it's slippery when wet.
customer_reviews.author: LBCostanzo

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoors activity center
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device for kids to have fun and action outdoors, It took a long time to assemble but it ended up to be very sturdy and safe. Our grandchildren loved it and their ages are 2, 3, and 5. All three were playing with it at the same time with no problems. I am not giving it 5 stars because the packaging was poor and arrived damaged with some parts almost falling out. It is shipped in its original thin box, good fol local purchase. But for mail order, it should be packed with additional box.
customer_reviews.author: Dov Zandman

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids, but customer service was poor...
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the backyard. It's good for all my kids, aged 5-13. My only negative was we got it for Christmas and it had a part missing. It took over a week to get the part. They refused to overnight it or rush it. So, their customer service isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy, easy to assemble but time consuming. Works well for our 2 and 4 year olds, and even I as an adult male feel secure on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Su

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to assemble but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Part of the best backyard play yard in the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: Monica P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product kids love!
customer_reviews.text: My husband built it by himself in about 3 hours. Just sort the pieces ahead of time. The kids love it!!! 3 and 6. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Great play equipment for kids! Not to hard to assemble since it is color coded. Not to tall, even at the top of the dome and very stable. Rubber caps are provided for the bolt backs and they snap on pretty snug so not much concern that they would just pop off leaving exposed bolt ends that could possibly hurt our kids.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this! It was a birthday gift for our daughter and has already gotten so much use! It's extremely sturdy, we have had ten children on it at once and it feels solid as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Becky E.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice Space Dome Climber, but it took over 4 hours to put it together. I had read that it took 2 hours, so that is quite a difference when you have a very busy schedule. We like the fact that there is nothing that the children can hurt themselves on, everything is covered up so there are no rough edges. I believe that this product will last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Margee

customer_reviews.title: Great children product
customer_reviews.text: Item took a couple hours to put together but does go quickly once you get the hang of it. Item is heavy and has been through many storms and doesn’t move much in the yard. Sturdy and well build
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year for my daughter and she absolutely loves it! We both climb all over it on a daily basis and it still looks brand new! also its big enough that she'll use it for many more years...bought it when she was 3 and still going strong...she'll be 5 soon and will fit it til shes at least 12! wonderful investment all her friends can enjoy for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Val (Bubbles)

customer_reviews.title: great outside fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome ! It was def a lot bigger than I expected it to be. Has to be put together outside as it wont go through a door otherwise. We have had this for 3 years now and it still looks like new. We live in Arizona and summer heat usually takes a toll on anything that is outside but not this one. Id recommend for anyone that has enough space outside.
customer_reviews.author: Myzith

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We just got it today, easy to assembly probably couple hours with help!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun for my 5 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fun for my 5 year old grandson! Not hard to put together, but READ the directions - if you get in a hurry you may get going in the wrong direction and have to backtrack. The directions were clear and understandable - no problem to put together. So far it's been sturdy and withstands extreme cold - still holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: It was a tedious piece to put together but we'll worth it in the end. Kids love climbing on it!
customer_reviews.author: 1Tazor

customer_reviews.title: Great climber
customer_reviews.text: We love this climber and so do our kids. Great for 5 and 2 year old. It is a project to put together so be ready and have 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product in all regards
customer_reviews.text: It earned a 5 star rating because it exceeded my expectations in all respects
customer_reviews.author: Jim Perotti

customer_reviews.title: Preschool kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble and the little kids love it! Purchased for my wife's preschool. The yellow caps come off very easily and could pose a choking hazard for some. I've removed them and reinstalled with a dab of construction adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: boonechev

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: You need 2 ppl to build it and the instructions are two pictures....horrible instructions
customer_reviews.author: alayna erdan

customer_reviews.title: It is a well built toy.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren play on it when several of them are here at the same time. Only so much climbing and hangin' they want to do. I bought another item for others to play on too. Nearly impossible to assemble without 2 people together.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Overturf

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase. The dome is very sturdy. Assembly takes some time and planning.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Super fun product!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing - we hung a swing from the middle and can cover it well with a parachute (think back to elementary gym class) to make forts :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I had hoped, but still provides fun for a very tall 8 year old to do flips and bends on.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Danette

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: The safest dome climber by far for my two little girls.
customer_reviews.author: Channing

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts... make sure you count everything!
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces... missing one of the yellow bars and one of the 6 hole brackets... it took many more days to be delivered,and now it's a holiday weekend, in a stay at home order and my kid cannot play on it.
customer_reviews.author: jessica WIlliams

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't able to use because all the parts didn't come in the box. Also the box was beat to hell and back.
customer_reviews.author: Taylorp

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic !!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this to anyone. It is so sturdy and colorful. It says on the labels that it can hold 200 pounds per child up to 1000 pounds and I believe it. You need a little skill building it, two of us built it pretty fast. It took 40 minutes to build it then 20 more to tighten all the bolts. A++ all the way.
customer_reviews.author: R. Iser

customer_reviews.title: Strength, endurance and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I luv that it gives my 3 ur old grandson the intensive activity he needs. He absolutely loves it !! If he’s jumping upset or agitated , being able to go out and climb is very helpful. It’s the best money I’ve ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Declue

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to put together, but not to bad. I have a in home day care and the kids I watch LOVE it. They cry when they have to go home. It is a great product and worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent strength and polish. My child loves it. Very confident on its sturdiness. Not for very young or careless children as the bars are metal and stiff, which can cause serious injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost Hack

customer_reviews.title: So far I am not happy because I am waiting for parts and it's been TWO Weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this climber to help my kids get more exercise in the backyard, I received it over two weeks ago and I am still waiting for the parts. I do not see what is so hard about putting the correct parts in the box. For $200 I should not be sitting around waiting like this. I would not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Apryl K

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my kids and they love it. Can’t wait for spring.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Betts

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it we put it together in the garage and then moved it outside. My kids love it! Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Tucson

customer_reviews.title: grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: great for small grandkids learning how to climb and fall
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Count the nuts and bolts before you start
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing to build this climber with my 5 year old helping only to not have enough nuts and bolts to complete the job. After I calmed her down, I contacted the manufacturer. While they are helpful and will supply the missing parts, we need to stare at the unfinished climber for 3-5 more days. Do your self a huge favor and count all the parts before you begin. Especially if you choose to have your child help:(.
customer_reviews.author: db San Diego

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece. She assembled and gave me the rating. That is: great, sturdy, colorful, and a wonderful addition to their yard and growing family.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Bradley

customer_reviews.title: But man its durable and the kids love love it
customer_reviews.text: Took 4 hours with help! But man its durable and the kids love love it! My friend and I combine for about 400 lbs and climbed on it. It didn't even budge.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Solid climbing structure
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid! I like that it is a bit smaller than the full size climbing domes as it takes up less space in the yard. Our son climbs on it almost every day, great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

product_meta.title: Easy Outdoor Space Dome Climber – Rust and UV Resistant Steel – 1000 lb. Capacity – For Kids Ages 3 to 9
product_meta.description:
Let children hang out and have fun in their personal playgrounds with the Easy Outdoor Space Dome Climber! The Space Dome Climber is made of top-quality steel, and its construction is durable and resilient. The steel is rust- and UV-resistant so that children can enjoy playing endlessly without worrying about getting rust particles on their hands or their clothes. This sturdy gear measures 91 x 46 x 91 inches (weight x height x depth). The climb dome is designed for children ages from 3 to 9. With a maximum capacity of 1,000 pounds, the Space Dome Climber supports up to 5 kids. The dome encourages your child to climb up, under, through and around the structure with other kids, helps them develop confidence, balance, strength, and agility, giving them hours of playtime and creativity while developing their interpersonal and social skills. Additionally, this dome is great for backyard installation. It is perfect for fenced residential areas where parents are able to watch over their children while they play, keeping them safe and secure. It comes with 2 year limited manufacturer warranty. The Easy Outdoor Space Dome Climber -- a simple fun for your child and family.

AMAZON.COM
Help your child develop confidence, balance, strength, and agility with the Easy Outdoor Geodescent Space Dome. Made of rust- and UV-resistant steel, the dome encourages your child to climb up, over, and around the structure with other kids, giving them hours of playtime and creativity while developing their interpersonal and social skills. Designed for children between ages 3 and 9, the dome measures 91 by 46 by 91 inches (W x H x D) and supports up to 1000 pounds. It also carries a two-year warranty.
feature_bullets: HIGH-QUALITY STEEL CONSTRUCTION – The Space Dome Climber is made of top-quality steel, which is rust- and UV-resistant for all-weather durability, great for outdoor use. Its construction is highly durable and resilient

ENDLESS HOURS OF PLAYTIME – By enjoying this colorful outdoor dome, the children will improve their limb strength, balance and agility, promote their social and comprehension skills, and develop their confidence while having fun in the sun

SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN AGES 3 TO 9 – Designed for children ages 3 to 9, this sturdy dome promotes fun and interpersonal traits. Parents can invite their children’s friends, and the fun never stops with the Space Dome Climber

MAXIMUM CAPACITY OF 1000 POUNDS – The Space Dome Climber has a maximum total weight capacity of 1000 pounds. Its dimensions measure 91 x 46 x 91 inches (weight x height x depth), which allows up to 5 children to play at the same time

IDEAL FOR BACKYARDS – This dome is applicable for backyard installation. It is perfect for fenced homes so that parents can watch over their children, making sure that they’re safe and secure while they play
